svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 26 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 26, 2023" date: "2023-08-26"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Dencun testing
overview Timelines for a short lived devnet 9 & upgrading public testnets to be discussed on next ACDE
call
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Dencun testing overview
Dencun testing overview
• Timelines for a short lived devnet 9 & upgrading public testnets to be discussed on next ACDE call
Timelines for a short lived devnet 9 & upgrading public testnets to be discussed on next ACDE call
• KZG Ceremony finished with 141,416 contributions, largest ceremony ever
KZG Ceremony finished with 141,416 contributions, largest ceremony ever
Layer 1
• Holešky testnet (Goerli replacement) Genesis file generated , launches September 15 with 1.46M
validators ACDC agreed to change Shapella upgrade to epoch 256, validator ejection balance to 28 hETH
and support compressed genesis state
Holešky testnet (Goerli replacement)
• Genesis file generated , launches September 15 with 1.46M validators
Genesis file generated , launches September 15 with 1.46M validators
• ACDC agreed to change Shapella upgrade to epoch 256, validator ejection balance to 28 hETH and
support compressed genesis state
ACDC agreed to change Shapella upgrade to epoch 256, validator ejection balance to 28 hETH and support
compressed genesis state
• Dapplion: Whisk (SSLE) expensive duty discovery can be solved using a validator’s public key
Dapplion: Whisk (SSLE) expensive duty discovery can be solved using a validator’s public key
For stakers
• Geth still supermajority EL client based on self-reported data from large pools & entities
Geth still supermajority EL client based on self-reported data from large pools & entities
• Siren v1 (Lighthouse's validator management UI): monitor node & validator health
Siren v1 (Lighthouse's validator management UI): monitor node & validator health
Client releases
• Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.8.0 : performance & stability improvements Prysm v4.0.8 : reduce memory
usage
Consensus layer:
• Nimbus v23.8.0 : performance & stability improvements
Nimbus v23.8.0 : performance & stability improvements
• Prysm v4.0.8 : reduce memory usage
Prysm v4.0.8 : reduce memory usage
• Execution layer: Besu v23.7.1 : performance & stability improvements, updated dependencies and
extended functionality of EVM tool & RPC trace modules Reth v0.1.0-alpha.7 : fixes for crawlers
reaching nodes, RPC & txpool and rudimentary eth_getProof support for accounts
Execution layer:
• Besu v23.7.1 : performance & stability improvements, updated dependencies and extended functionality
of EVM tool & RPC trace modules
Besu v23.7.1 : performance & stability improvements, updated dependencies and extended functionality
• Reth v0.1.0-alpha.7 : fixes for crawlers reaching nodes, RPC & txpool and rudimentary eth_getProof
support for accounts
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.7 : fixes for crawlers reaching nodes, RPC & txpool and rudimentary eth_getProof
Research
• Super-finality confirmation rule for Casper, can implement client-side/wallets using Beacon API
Super-finality confirmation rule for Casper, can implement client-side/wallets using Beacon API
• Proof of Validator : anonymous credential scheme for Distributed Hash Table participants
Proof of Validator : anonymous credential scheme for Distributed Hash Table participants
Layer 2
• RISC Zero Zeth : zk block prover based on revm
RISC Zero Zeth : zk block prover based on revm
• Base uses 2/2 upgrade multisig (Optimism Foundation & Base) Coinbase will contribute minimum 2.5% of
Base sequencer revenue to Optimism Collective for RetroPGF & ecosystem projects Optimism granting up
to ~118M OP tokens (2.7% of supply) over 6 years to Coinbase
Base uses 2/2 upgrade multisig (Optimism Foundation & Base)
• Coinbase will contribute minimum 2.5% of Base sequencer revenue to Optimism Collective for RetroPGF
& ecosystem projects
Coinbase will contribute minimum 2.5% of Base sequencer revenue to Optimism Collective for RetroPGF &
ecosystem projects
• Optimism granting up to ~118M OP tokens (2.7% of supply) over 6 years to Coinbase
Optimism granting up to ~118M OP tokens (2.7% of supply) over 6 years to Coinbase
EIPs/Standards
• Updated EIP editor handbook (EIP5069)
Updated EIP editor handbook (EIP5069)
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7502 : Self tradable NFT ERC7503 : Zero-knowledge wormholes ERC7504 :
Dynamic contracts (one-to-many proxy contracts)
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7502 : Self tradable NFT
ERC7502 : Self tradable NFT
• ERC7503 : Zero-knowledge wormholes
ERC7503 : Zero-knowledge wormholes
• ERC7504 : Dynamic contracts (one-to-many proxy contracts)
ERC7504 : Dynamic contracts (one-to-many proxy contracts)
The Tornado Cash devs helped bring privacy to Ethereum. In return, the US federal government is trying
to put them in jail
Watch Ameen Soleimani discuss the injustice of the US federal charges brought against Roman Storm and
Roman Semenov for writing open source code. (Or listen )
Donate to the legal defense fund . (KYC required)
Stuff for developers
• Foundry: Vulcan v0.2.0 (dev framework): adds gas estimation and deployment address calculation Cast
rpc with jwt secret allows Engine API calls to EL
Foundry:
• Vulcan v0.2.0 (dev framework): adds gas estimation and deployment address calculation
Vulcan v0.2.0 (dev framework): adds gas estimation and deployment address calculation
• Cast rpc with jwt secret allows Engine API calls to EL
Cast rpc with jwt secret allows Engine API calls to EL
• Full Stack dapp workshop using ScaffoldETH-2 and The Graph
Full Stack dapp workshop using ScaffoldETH-2 and The Graph
• Ape Framework code coverage guide
Ape Framework code coverage guide
• Ape-hackathon-kit : develop contracts in Ape framework and web apps in Next.js, Tailwind, RainbowKit
& wagmi
Ape-hackathon-kit : develop contracts in Ape framework and web apps in Next.js, Tailwind, RainbowKit &
wagmi
• WhatsABI v0.8.0 (guesses ABI from bytecode): tested with ethers.js v5/6 & viem, bundle size reduced
to 12KB
WhatsABI v0.8.0 (guesses ABI from bytecode): tested with ethers.js v5/6 & viem, bundle size reduced to
12KB
• TrueBlocks v1 and EF grant report
TrueBlocks v1 and EF grant report
• tx2uml v1.1.23 : adds options to hide parameter names/values in trace; v1.1.24 supports Base
tx2uml v1.1.23 : adds options to hide parameter names/values in trace; v1.1.24 supports Base
• wagmi mipd : TypeScript utilities for ERC6963 (Multi Injected Provider Discovery)
mipd : TypeScript utilities for ERC6963 (Multi Injected Provider Discovery)
• CTFs: Curta CTF: devtooligan’s Elohim solution Paradigm CTF October 28-30
CTFs:
• Curta CTF: devtooligan’s Elohim solution
Curta CTF: devtooligan’s Elohim solution
• Paradigm CTF October 28-30
Paradigm CTF October 28-30
• Cryogen : consolidate parquets into larger chunks for smaller datasets & faster queries
Cryogen : consolidate parquets into larger chunks for smaller datasets & faster queries
Security
• Balancer v2 pools vulnerability disclosed , withdraw affected LPs
Ecosystem
• Danny Ryan rebuts Lido’s claim that dual governance mitigates risks to Ethereum as Lido nears 33% of
stake
Danny Ryan rebuts Lido’s claim that dual governance mitigates risks to Ethereum as Lido nears 33% of
• Hackathon projects: ETHToronto , ETHWomen and Ethereum Argentina
Hackathon projects: ETHToronto , ETHWomen and Ethereum Argentina
• Etherscan search bar shortcut : press “/”
Etherscan search bar shortcut : press “/”
Notable at app layer
• Privacy & Scaling Explorations Bandada v1 : create/manage privacy-preserving groups of anons
Privacy & Scaling Explorations Bandada v1 : create/manage privacy-preserving groups of anons
• ScopeLift: DAO voting from Layer 2 with flexible voting , proof of concept
ScopeLift: DAO voting from Layer 2 with flexible voting , proof of concept
• Base apps: Friend Tech adds photo sharing with key holders StoryBase : fee per character
collaborative writing, snippets minted as NFTs Parody bike race : mint/steal NFTs of NYC Citi Bikes in
10 day race
Base apps:
• Friend Tech adds photo sharing with key holders
Friend Tech adds photo sharing with key holders
• StoryBase : fee per character collaborative writing, snippets minted as NFTs
StoryBase : fee per character collaborative writing, snippets minted as NFTs
• Parody bike race : mint/steal NFTs of NYC Citi Bikes in 10 day race
Parody bike race : mint/steal NFTs of NYC Citi Bikes in 10 day race
Job Listings
• EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek ZK circuits engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• Roman Semenov & Roman Storm (Tornado Cash co-founders) unjustly charged with conspiracy to launder
money because they wrote open source code: Roman Storm arrested and out on bail . OFAC sanctioned
Roman Semenov Donate to legal defense fund . (KYC required) web3 Builders: interview with Ameen
Soleimani about the charges
Roman Semenov & Roman Storm (Tornado Cash co-founders) unjustly charged with conspiracy to launder
money because they wrote open source code:
• Roman Storm arrested and out on bail .
Roman Storm arrested and out on bail .
• OFAC sanctioned Roman Semenov
OFAC sanctioned Roman Semenov
• Donate to legal defense fund . (KYC required)
Donate to legal defense fund . (KYC required)
• web3 Builders: interview with Ameen Soleimani about the charges
web3 Builders: interview with Ameen Soleimani about the charges
• Nate Chastain sentenced to 3 months jail, $50k fine + proceeds for OpenSea insider trading
Nate Chastain sentenced to 3 months jail, $50k fine + proceeds for OpenSea insider trading
• Bitstamp ending Ethereum staking for US customers
Bitstamp ending Ethereum staking for US customers
• USDC changes : Circle to control issuance & Coinbase taking equity stake in Circle
USDC changes : Circle to control issuance & Coinbase taking equity stake in Circle
• Proposed draconian US tax rules would require KYC for most blockchain transfers and blocking US
citizens from nearly everything, comments open until October 30
Proposed draconian US tax rules would require KYC for most blockchain transfers and blocking US
General
• BlockFi, FTX & Genesis bankruptcy claimants data stolen from Kroll via T-Mobile SIM swap
BlockFi, FTX & Genesis bankruptcy claimants data stolen from Kroll via T-Mobile SIM swap
• MACI v1 trusted setup ceremony
MACI v1 trusted setup ceremony
• Arnaucube: intuition for ProtoGalaxy folding scheme
Arnaucube: intuition for ProtoGalaxy folding scheme
• Soundness notions for Interactive Oracle Proofs (IOPs)
Soundness notions for Interactive Oracle Proofs (IOPs)
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-august-26-2023
